00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::ShowAnswers;

00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::ShowAnswers.pm  -- display past answers of students

00026 use strict;
00027 use warnings;
00028 #use CGI;
00029 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00030 
00031 
00032 sub initialize {
00033     my $self       = shift;
00034     my $r          = $self->r;
00035     my $urlpath    = $r->urlpath;
00036     my $db         = $r->db;
00037     my $ce         = $r->ce;
00038     my $authz      = $r->authz;
00039     my $courseName = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00040     my $user       = $r->param('user');
00041     
00042     unless ($authz->hasPermissions($user, "view_answers")) {
00043         $self->addbadmessage("You aren't authorized to view past answers");
00044         return;
00045     }
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 sub body {
00050     my $self          = shift;
00051     my $r             = $self->r;
00052     my $urlpath       = $r->urlpath;
00053     my $db            = $r->db;
00054     my $ce            = $r->ce;
00055     my $authz         = $r->authz;
00056     my $root          = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
00057     my $courseName    = $urlpath->arg('courseID');  
00058     my $setName       = $r->param('setID');     # these are passed in the search args in this case
00059     my $problemNumber = $r->param('problemID');
00060     my $user          = $r->param('user');
00061     my $key           = $r->param('key');
00062     my $studentUser   = $r->param('studentUser') if ( defined($r->param('studentUser')) );
00063     
00064     return CGI::em("You are not authorized to access the instructor tools") unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00065     return CGI::em("You are not authorized to view past answers") unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "view_answers");
00066     
00067     my $showAnswersPage   = $urlpath->newFromModule($urlpath->module,  $r, courseID => $courseName);
00068     my $showAnswersURL    = $self->systemLink($showAnswersPage,authen => 0 );
00069     
00070     #####################################################################
00071     # print form
00072     #####################################################################
00073 
00074     print CGI::p(),CGI::hr();
00075 
00076     print CGI::start_form("POST", $showAnswersURL,-target=>'information'),
00077           $self->hidden_authen_fields;
00078     print CGI::submit(-name => 'action', -value=>'Past Answers for')," &nbsp; ",
00079           CGI::textfield(-name => 'studentUser', -value => $studentUser, -size =>10 ),
00080           " &nbsp; Set: &nbsp;",
00081           CGI::textfield( -name => 'setID', -value => $setName, -size =>10  ), 
00082               " &nbsp; Problem: &nbsp;",
00083           CGI::textfield(-name => 'problemID', -value => $problemNumber,-size =>10  ),  
00084           " &nbsp; ";
00085     print CGI::end_form();
00086 
00087     if (defined($setName) and defined($problemNumber) )  {
00088         #####################################################################
00089         # print result table of answers
00090         #####################################################################
00091         my $answer_log    = $self->{ce}->{courseFiles}->{logs}->{'answer_log'};
00092     
00093         $studentUser = $r->param('studentUser') if ( defined($r->param('studentUser')) );
00094         
00095         print CGI::h3("Past Answers for $studentUser, set $setName, problem $problemNumber" );
00096     
00097         $studentUser = "[^|]*"   if ($studentUser eq ""    or $studentUser eq "*");
00098         $setName = "[^|]*"       if ($setName eq ""  or $setName eq "*");
00099         $problemNumber = "[^|]*" if ($problemNumber eq "" or $problemNumber eq "*");
00100         
00101         my $pattern = "^[^|]*\\|$studentUser\\|$setName\\|$problemNumber\\|";
00102         
00103         if (-e $answer_log) {
00104             if (open my $log, $answer_log) {
00105                 my $line;
00106                 $self->{lastdate} = '';
00107                 $self->{lasttime} = 0;
00108                 $self->{lastID}   = '';
00109                 $self->{lastn}    = 0;
00110                 
00111                 my @lines = grep(/$pattern/,<$log>); close($log);
00112                 chomp(@lines);
00113                 foreach $line (@lines) {$line = substr($line,27)}; # remove datestamp
00114                 
00115                 print CGI::start_table({border=>0,cellpadding=>0,cellspacing=>3,align=>"center"});
00116                 print "No entries for $studentUser set $setName, problem $problemNumber" unless @lines;
00117                 foreach $line (sort byData @lines) {$self->tableRow(split("\t",$line,-1))}
00118                 print CGI::Tr(CGI::td({colspan=>$self->{lastn}},CGI::hr({size=>3}))) if ($self->{lastn});
00119                 print CGI::end_table();
00120             } else {
00121                 $self->addbadmessage("Failed to open the answer log '$answer_log': $!");
00122             }
00123         } else {
00124             # no answer log exists yet -- this is probably not an error
00125             print "No answers have been logged. (Answer log '$answer_log' does not exist.)";
00126         }
00127     }
00128         
00129     return "";
00130 }
00131 
00132 sub byData {
00133   my ($A,$B) = ($a,$b);
00134   $A =~ s/\|[01]*\t([^\t]+)\t.*/|$1/; # remove answers and correct/incorrect status
00135   $B =~ s/\|[01]*\t([^\t]+)\t.*/|$1/;
00136   return $A cmp $B;
00137 }
00138 
00139 sub tableRow {
00140   my $self = shift;
00141   my ($answer,$score,$studentUser,$set,$prob);
00142   my ($ID,$rtime,@answers) = @_; pop(@answers);
00143   my $scores = ''; $scores = $1 if ($ID =~ s/\|([01]+)$/|/);
00144   my @scores = split(//, $scores);
00145   my $date = scalar(localtime($rtime)); $date =~ s/\s+/ /g;
00146   my ($day,$month,$mdate,$time,$year) = split(" ",$date);
00147   $date = "$mdate $month $year";
00148   my $n = 2*(scalar(@answers)+1);
00149 
00150   if ($self->{lastID} ne $ID) {
00151     if ($self->{lastn}) {
00152       print CGI::Tr(CGI::td({colspan=>$self->{lastn}},CGI::hr({size=>3}))),
00153             CGI::end_table(),CGI::p();
00154       print CGI::start_table({border=>0,cellpadding=>0,cellspacing=>3,align=>"center"});
00155     }
00156     ($studentUser,$set,$prob) = (split('\|',$ID))[1,2,3];
00157     print CGI::Tr({align=>"center"},
00158           CGI::td({colspan=>$n},CGI::hr({size=>3}),
00159               "User: "   .CGI::b($studentUser)." &nbsp; ",
00160               "Set: "    .CGI::b($set)." &nbsp; ",
00161               "Problem: ".CGI::b($prob))),"\n";
00162     $self->{lastID}   = $ID;
00163     $self->{lasttime} = 0;
00164     $self->{lastdate} = "";
00165   }
00166 
00167   print CGI::Tr(CGI::td({colspan=>$n},CGI::hr({size=>1})))
00168     if ($rtime - $self->{lasttime} > 30*60);
00169   $self->{lasttime} = $rtime;
00170   $self->{lastn} = $n;
00171 
00172   if ($self->{lastdate} ne $date) {
00173     print CGI::Tr(CGI::td({colspan=>$n},CGI::small(CGI::i($date))));
00174     $self->{lastdate} = $date;
00175   }
00176 
00177   ##
00178   ##  These colors really should use CSS and the template
00179   ##
00180   my @row = (CGI::td({width=>10}),CGI::td({style=>"color:#808080"},CGI::small($time)));
00181   my $td = {nowrap => 1};
00182   foreach $answer (@answers) {
00183     $answer =~ s/(^\s+|\s+$)//g;
00184     $answer = showHTML($answer);
00185     $score = shift(@scores); $td->{style} = $score? "color:#006600": "color:#660000";
00186     delete($td->{style}) unless $answer ne "" && defined($score);
00187     $answer = CGI::small(CGI::i("empty")) if ($answer eq "");
00188     push(@row,CGI::td({width=>20}),CGI::td($td,$answer));
00189   }
00190   print CGI::Tr(@row);
00191 }
00192 
00193 ##################################################
00194 #
00195 #  Make HTML symbols printable
00196 #
00197 sub showHTML {
00198     my $string = shift;
00199     return '' unless defined $string;
00200     $string =~ s/&/\&amp;/g;
00201     $string =~ s/</\&lt;/g;
00202     $string =~ s/>/\&gt;/g;
00203     $string =~ s/\000/,/g;  # anyone know why this is here?  (I didn't add it -- dpvc)
00204     $string;
00205 }
